attributes.action: Stop the proposed sale of the liner R.M.S. Queen Elizabeth 2 to Middle Eastern interests and acquire the ship for the nation as the last and greatest British built ocean liner.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is proposed to withdraw from service the last British built Cunard atlantic liner and sell it to Middle East interests to be based in Abu Dhabi. The QE2 deserves to be preserved in the country of its' origin for future generations as the last of its' line and in view of its service and history. No such opportunity will occur in the future. The loss of both the previous "Queens" was a national disgrace and this must not be allowed to happen again.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
